author: Simon Difford
description: This short, rye-based, spirit-forward, and delicately floral "Up" (straight-up/ without ice) cocktail is best enjoyed as a "sharpener" before or after a meal.
name: Rye's Up
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass (no ice in glass)
